question: Which state government is to work with French-based companyÂ  Suez to provide drinking water distribution system?
explanation: French-based company Suez won a contract to extend, rehabilitate and operate the drinking water distribution system in Mangalore. The total cost of the project is Rs.792.42 crore. The state aims to give pure drinking water to the citizens of Mangalore in all the wards of the city corporation. The state has implemented a 24/7 water supply scheme. The entire project will be funded by the state government.
